name: 'Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman' The Final Season Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the flashback episode, "To Have and To Hold", what memory did Doctor Mike recall when she told Sully he taught her a lot of things when she first came to Colorado Springs?
questions.correct: Walking like a man in "The Race"
options: Jumping off a cliff in "The Abduction"
Introducing her to the Cheyenne Indians in "Pilot"
Showing her how to take care of a home in "Pilot"
questions.explanation:
Walking like a man in "The Race".

	While on their way home, Doctor Mike tripped and hit her head on a rock. Sully found an abandoned cabin for them to stay in. Sully had to keep Doctor Mike awake so she wouldn't slip into a coma. They talked about different things in the past, including their miscarriage.

questions.text: What member of Doctor Mike's family died from pneumonia caused by intubation in "A Time to Heal"?
questions.explanation:
Doctor Mike's sister, Marjorie.

	Marjorie died from double pneumonia after she was intubated to help her breathe after she was stricken with diptheria. There was nothing Doctor Mike or Doctor Cook could do because the fluid in Marjorie's lungs kept building. Doctor Cook woke Marjorie up so she could say goodbye to everyone. Marjorie died in Loren's arms before her mother could get to town.

questions.text: What was the name of the episode that involved the death of Robert E. and Grace's son, Anthony?
questions.explanation:
A Place Called Home.

	Anthony's illness became progressively worse after he suffered a slight stroke in "A Place Called Home". He was able to read his winning essay about Colorado Springs and his funeral was shown as he read the essay.

questions.text: What important event happened the night of the Sweetheart's Dance in "Seven Kinds of Lonely"?
options: Loren left Colorado Springs for good
Dorothy admitted she was in love with Cloud Dancing
questions.explanation:
Teresa accepted Jake's proposal.

	Jake had proposed to Teresa earlier in the episode and she accepted during the Sweetheart's Dance. Loren was going to San Francisco to live because he missed Marjorie. After talking to Dorothy and Doctor Mike, Loren decided he was just going to San Francisco on vacation and then would return a few weeks later.

questions.text: In "A Matter of Conscience", who was the first person to suggest that Daniel run as the new sheriff after Matthew quit?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Brian made the first suggestion when the town learned that Hank had appointed himself town sheriff. Daniel declined until Sully asked him to run to keep an eye on the town. Daniel ran and beat Hank for the job of town sheriff.

questions.text: In "Birdman", who recognized the Birdman as being a prominent member of a New York family?
questions.explanation:
Preston.

	After Doctor Mike and Jake cleaned up the Birdman, Preston remembered him from a wedding he attended in New York. After sending a telegram to New York, Preston talked to Daniel. Birdman was really Martin Chesterfield, an escapee from Bellevue hospital in New York. Before his family came to get him, Matthew, Doctor Mike, and Brian helped Martin escape back into the woods.

questions.text: How did Daniel learn of Sully's accident and subsequent arrest warrant from the Army in "Reason to Believe"?
questions.correct: He read it in the paper
options: Matthew sent a telegram asking for help
He came to Colorado Springs for a vacation and found out
questions.explanation:
He read it in the paper.

	Daniel Simon returned in the sixth season opener "Reason to Believe" to help find Sully. Brian saw him riding into the homestead after returning from the barn. Daniel promised Doctor Mike he was only there to help find his best friend.

questions.text: In "Comfort of Friends", what holiday was the town getting ready to celebrate when Doctor Mike admitted to having a miscarriage?
questions.explanation:
Founders Day.

	The town was getting ready for Founders Day around the time that Doctor Mike miscarried her second child. Grace and Dorothy went to the homestead to be with her and Doctor Mike was able to cry on the shoulders of her two best friends.

questions.text: After returning from her college graduation, where did Andrew propose to Colleen in "A New Beginning"?
questions.explanation:
The homestead.

	Andrew was upset that Colleen was leaving for medical school in Pennsylvania in a few weeks so Sully told him to do something about it. Andrew arrived at the homestead later and proposed to Colleen. She accepted and they married at the church. The reception ended the series.

questions.text: In "A New Beginning", who announced a pregnancy at Colleen and Andrew's wedding reception to the viewers but to no one else?
questions.explanation:
Grace and Robert E.

	While they were dancing, Grace announced to Robert E. that they were going to have a baby. The series ended with people dancing, Colleen and Andrew moving to Pennsylvania, Teresa and Jake building a house, and Loren buying into Dorothy's Gazette.
